Description: Search engine for B2B prospects, helping sales department reach decision makers worldwide.
Name: Datafy

Methods.Name: Retrieve Contact
Methods.Description: Retrieve a single contacts details from Datafy.

Methods.Name: Retrieve Employees
Methods.Description: Retrieve a list of contacts that have a position at the specified company.

Methods.Name: Estimate
Methods.Description: Estimate number of results based on keywords

Methods.Name: Run New Search
Methods.Description: A new Search is created and started for the Customer.

Methods.Name: Get Search Results - Persons
Methods.Description: Get Persons that resulted from the search.

Methods.Name: Get Search Results - Companies
Methods.Description: Get Companies that resulted from the search.

Methods.Name: Countries
Methods.Description: A collection of Countries available when running Queries

Methods.Name: Industries
Methods.Description: A collection of Industries available when running Queries.

Methods.Name: Companies
Methods.Description: A collection of Companies available when running Queries.

Methods.Name: Run New Partner Query
Methods.Description: Search-related actions of the Partner API. All actions are customer-specific, which means that a customer ID must be provided as a part of the URL to be able to list or run searches and retrieve their results.
